content: Sorry I was last week. It was indeed Mozilla All Hands.

I haven't had much time to do much work prep work here, but I'm happy to chat and/or answer questions right now. One thing I'm thinking about is the fact that I am going to be on vacation from mid July - mid August.

So let's talk brass tacks. It's clear I've not had the time/energy to really help lead this WG over the last N months. =) I'm trying to make my plans/priorities the 2nd half of the year, and in particular to figure out where trait work fits in. It seems like we still desperately need progress in this area, as lazy norm / GATs are big blockers for a lot of other things. In addition, the current trait impl feels increasingly "risky" and complex to me.

Hey @WG-traits -- weekly meeting

Can't make it this week as usual...about to head out... but do check your PMs when you have a minute please. Been a while, and could desperately use your input on a couple of PRs. :-)

OK -- well, not a lot of action here today and that's fine. As I wrote above, I'm trying to figure out our next steps. In the meantime, I'll try to spend some time reviewing things and so forth. @Sunjay Varma and I also just scheduled a meeting for next week to talk about specialization and overall query structure.
